"Absolute Majority Vote" means a vote at a Regular or Special Meeting of ei
"Abstention" means the decision by a Board Member to not vote on a motion o
"Board" means the Tribal Governing Board of the Lac Court Oreilles Band of
"Constitution and Bylaws" refers to the Amended Constitution and Bylaws of
"Executive Session" means a Board Meeting or part of a Board Meeting that i
"General Membership Meeting" means a meeting of the Board held in the manne
"Other Business" means all matters not identified by the pre-meeting agenda
"Quorum" means the presence of four (4) Members of the Board at a Regular o
"Regular Meeting" means a meeting of the Board held in the manner prescribe
"Regular Order of Business" means the order in which matters come before th
"Simple Majority Vote" means a majority vote of Board Members who are prese
"Special Meeting" means a meeting of the Board held in the manner prescribe
"Tribal Members" means the membership of the Tribe as defined by Article II
"Tribe" means the Lac Courte Oreilles Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indian
